entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VerifyPdb helper doesn't include information about usings into XML used to verify baselines for portable format. #75300
  • `MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync(..)` fails with "[BuildHost PID 3328] The BuildHost process exited with -1. Process output:" #75292
  • Diagnostic suppressor seems to work only for open files #75291

Closed

  • IReadOnlyList/IReadOnlySet Collection Expression Parity #75308
  • Feature 'Edit and Continue' currently unavailable due to an internal error. Read out of bounds. #65176
    Backlog
  • IDE0028/IDE0090/IDE00300/IDE0305 do not catch some expressions #72699
    Backlog
  • Call sites of a type marked with `[CreateNewOnMetadataUpdate]` don't use the updated type on metadata updates #70604
  • Assert failure when building runtime: Synthesized attribute constructor missing #75032
    17.12
  • Variables captured in a lambda and in a local function are getting different treatment in DefiniteAssignmentPass #66557
    Backlog
  • "IDE0018 Variable declaration can be inlined" missing in top-level statements #74736
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error reporting when reading bad metadata during EnC #75304
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • PR feedback on "use collection expression". #75303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix interactive window pull diags #75298
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update insertion model after VS snap #75295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix the path to the proposal #75302
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Switch caching file comparer to a threadstatic storage to prevent locks #75297
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix TSA tooling #75307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Clarify the bug template to request a code snippet #75306
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bump razor for serialization changes #75282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Detect more fluent cases for converting collection expressions #75267
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disallow declaration of indexers in absence of proper DefaultMemberAttribute. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Collapse the rename UI when commit starts #75213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • don't mess with user caret in smart rename #75294
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2548898 #75274
    auto-merge
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for inlining declarations in top level code #75258
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix `NETCOREAPP3_0_OR_GREATER` in `SegmentedArrayHelper` #74687
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update LanguageServer references #75290
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Fix issue simplifying name in speculative context #75255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
